Header.title: DevBee
Header.paragraph: Worlds Most Valuable Developers Enabling the Business to Next Level. People First Culture and Great Delivery of Apps.

About.paragraph: We are home to seasoned engineers who love to solve your complex problems. Technology and People are at the heart of our Organisation. Your dream to reality. In any platform! Research and Development are about bringing dreams to reality and we have done it already for over 50+ apps in almost every single platform and device available. If you have an idea we can bring it to life.
Why: We Are On Time And On Budget

Services.name: Customer Experience, Product and Design
Services.text: Drive value through extraordinary customer experiences powered by integrated technology and design.

Services.name: Data and AI
Services.text: Maximize the business value and enable better decision making with pragmatic data strategies, governance and unrivalled skill sets in predictive AI and ML programming.

Services.name: Digital Transformation and Operations
Services.text: Evolve your organization with focused operational models and pragmatic strategies for organizational change that increase your agility, resilience and ability to compete.

Services.name: Enterprise Modernization, Platforms and Cloud
Services.text: Modernize your operations, platforms, development and delivery practices to deliver business value faster.

Services.name: For customer support
Services.text: A customer support tool that helps redefine your customer service and ensure customer loyalty.

Services.name: For IT operations
Services.text: Customer support tool that helps IT and ITES companies deliver outstanding support.

Testimonials.text: "With DevBee, I finally feel that I can trust the data I’m able to export from the system. We implemented the solution for email tracking but are now leveraging it to track incoming invoices as well. If a business is facing similar problems to ours in terms of tracking incoming emails or a high number of incoming emails from the same customers or suppliers, in my opinion DevBee really is the best solution to resolve this. With DevBee, you really are able to track everything that is coming in, and analyze the data in real-time."
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: "With DevBee we have a specialized partner, whose vast customer portfolio across multiple industries, sees and knows the next “big thing” in customer support, and integrates this into a compact and cost-effective solution, saving considerable effort, time and cost for us. In short, it allows us to focus on happy customers – the rest we leave to DevBee."
Testimonials.name: Midas Hofstra

Testimonials.text: "With DevBee, I finally feel that I can trust the data I’m able to export from the system. We implemented the solution for email tracking but are now leveraging it to track incoming invoices as well. If a business is facing similar problems to ours in terms of tracking incoming emails or a high number of incoming emails from the same customers or suppliers, in my opinion DevBee really is the best solution to resolve this. With DevBee, you really are able to track everything that is coming in, and analyze the data in real-time."
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Features.title: Create value, fast
Features.text: Accelerate your team’s productivity and efficiency with modern automation and collaboration tools, to get tangible results in no time.

Features.title: Build & customize as you go
Features.text: Extend and tailor experiences to meet your unique business needs, with low-code development and over 55 custom apps made on our marketplace.

Features.title: Choose your pricing plan
Features.text: Our pricing plans are designed for modern business use cases and affordable for organizations of all sizes.

Features.title: Get up and running with no barriers
Features.text: Try or purchase our software directly from our website, and onboard in a matter of days, not months.
